e.g., If Coinbase ‚Äúhas to‚Äù do something to comply with the US govt sanctions that causes slashing, all the users who staked with Coinbase are going to feel baited and switched for having staked their ETH years before. The recent snafu with Bitriver sanctions and Compass Mining is a good example of ‚Äúyikes US govt‚Äù‚Ä¶

Formalizing the norms as suggested would be a good start.
